channel.title: [BIG IMGS] 125cc Thumpster Pit Bike Drive Sprocket XXX Anus
channel.description:
[img]http://i25.tinypic.com/dwthk1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i30.tinypic.com/kdwgls.jpg[/img]
125cc Pit Bike (Thump). Fairly good condition, rebuilt engine not two week ago.
Drive sprocket slams off when you engage first, let out the clutch and build upto 5-10mph. Obviously this throws off the chain aswell as the sprocket.
Looks like where the sprocket meets the drive shaft it's missing a sir clip but experience would say with this sort of thing it should be a counter locking nut and folded washer.
wtb fix so i can thrash it again.
oh i should mention it rode perfectly before i ragged it up a flight of stairs in 2nd

item.title: [BIG IMGS] 125cc Thumpster Pit Bike Drive Sprocket XXX Anus
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:2, topic:351078”][quote author=Cowie` link=topic=447434.msg3283777#msg3283777 date=1280065061]
oh i should mention it rode perfectly before i ragged it up a flight of stairs in 2nd
[/quote]

what did it ever do to you :([/quote]

nothing, i just thought if i tried to ride it up some stairs i’d be cool - it rode wierd after that, then when we went over a field it lolowned itself.

Read full topic

125cc Pit Bike (Thump).
Fairly good condition, rebuilt engine not two week ago.

Drive sprocket slams off when you engage first, let out the clutch and build upto 5-10mph. Obviously this throws off the chain aswell as the sprocket.

Looks like where the sprocket meets the drive shaft it’s missing a sir clip but experience would say with this sort of thing it should be a counter locking nut and folded washer.
